PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MaintenanceTriggerDuration
PropertySetDef.Definition: Trigger levels for an asset that has an PPM based maintenance strategy.

PropertyDef.Name: DurationTargetPerformance
PropertyDef.Definition: Target time to failure of the asset

PropertyDef.Name: DurationMaintenanceLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Duration interval at which maintenance is performed

PropertyDef.Name: DurationReplacementLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Duration interval at which replacement is performed

PropertyDef.Name: DurationDisposalLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Duration interval at which disposal is performed
